comments:
Eclipse Build ID: M20070212-1330 
MyEclipse Build ID: 20070302-5.1.1-GA

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create query to give current users all Jira tasks (Jira 3.7.3)
2. Navigate to task, enter comment.
3. Try to mark resolved or closed, and submit.

 ... or ...

1. Create new repository task.
2. Enter task info.
3. Submit.

More information:
Submit generate error popup box with no message and no details.  Stack trace in the error log shows:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException:
at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Assert.isLegal(Assert.java:62)
at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Assert.isLegal(Assert.java:46)
at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Status.setMessage(Status.java:178)
at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Status.<init>(Status.java:85)
at org.eclipse.mylar.tasks.core.MylarStatus.<init>(MylarStatus.java:37)
at org.eclipse.mylar.tasks.core.RepositoryStatus.<init>(RepositoryStatus.java:39)
at org.eclipse.mylar.tasks.core.RepositoryStatus.<init>(RepositoryStatus.java:35)
at org.eclipse.mylar.tasks.core.RepositoryStatus.createHtmlStatus(RepositoryStatus.java:96)
at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.jira.core.JiraCorePlugin.toStatus(JiraCorePlugin.java:153)
at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.jira.ui.JiraTaskDataHandler.postTaskData(JiraTaskDataHandler.java:393)
at org.eclipse.mylar.tasks.ui.editors.AbstractRepositoryTaskEditor$32.run(AbstractRepositoryTaskEditor.java:2727)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
It seems like you are using *very* old version. There is no mylar packages for some time. Please update Mylyn from the Europa update site and install new connectros from the extras update site.
Update sites are listed at: http://www.eclipse.org/mylyn/downloads/
